keyEvents.event: Village celebrates liberation from Arlong's eight-year tyranny
keyEvents.significance: Marks the complete freedom of the village after Arlong's defeat

keyEvents.event: Nami visits Bell-mère's grave to say goodbye
keyEvents.significance: Nami finds closure with her past before leaving to join the Straw Hats

keyEvents.event: Bell-mère's spirit appears to Nami in her old house
keyEvents.significance: Provides Nami with emotional closure and encouragement (anime-original scene)

keyEvents.event: Genzo leaves his pinwheel at Bell-mère's grave
keyEvents.significance: Symbolizes Genzo accepting Nami's departure and growth

keyEvents.event: The Straw Hat Pirates depart from the village with Nami
keyEvents.significance: Marks Nami's official departure from her hometown to pursue her dream

reveals.reveal: Bell-mère's grave is located in Cocoyashi Village

keyEvents.event: All islands in the archipelago celebrate freedom from Arlong
keyEvents.significance: Shows the widespread impact of the Straw Hats' victory over Arlong

keyEvents.event: The Straw Hat Pirates depart from the Conomi Islands
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Arlong Park Arc and the crew's departure from this region
